verses.verse: ( Jesus the True Vine) ( ( 290 27:1-13 )) Ἐγώ <WG1473> Egō [“] I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἄμπελος <WG288> ampelos vine , ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἀληθινή <WG228> alēthinē true καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father μου <WG1473> mou My ὁ <WG3588> ho the γεωργός <WG1092> geōrgos keeper of the vineyard . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is

πᾶν <WG3956> pan every κλῆμα <WG2814> klēma branch ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv φέρον <WG5342> pheron that bears no καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit , αἴρει <WG142> airei He cuts off αὐτό <WG846> auto . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai and πᾶν <WG3956> pan every [branch] τὸ <WG3588> to that καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit , φέρον <WG5342> pheron does bear καθαίρει <WG2508> kathairei He prunes αὐτὸ <WG846> auto - ἵνα <WG2443> hina to make it καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon . . . . πλείονα <WG4119> pleiona . . . φέρῃ <WG5342> pherē even more fruitful

ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē already ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis You καθαροί <WG2513> katharoi clean ἐστε <WG1510> este are διὰ <WG1223> dia because of τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word ὃν <WG3739> hon - λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have spoken ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you .

μείνατε <WG3306> meinate Remain ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοί <WG1473> emoi Me , κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I will remain ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs Just as τὸ <WG3588> to - κλῆμα <WG2814> klēma branch οὐ <WG3756> ou no δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit φέρειν <WG5342> pherein bear ἀφ’ <WG575> aph’ vvv ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou by itself ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . μένῃ <WG3306> menē it remains ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἀμπέλῳ <WG288> ampelō vine , οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs - οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude neither [can] ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you [bear fruit] ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me . μένητε <WG3306> menēte you remain

Ἐγώ <WG1473> Egō I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἄμπελος <WG288> ampelos vine ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis [and] you [are] τὰ <WG3588> ta the κλήματα <WG2814> klēmata branches . ὁ <WG3588> ho The [one who] μένων <WG3306> menōn remains ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me , κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I ἐν <WG1722> en in αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him , οὗτος <WG3778> houtos - φέρει <WG5342> pherei will bear καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit . πολύν <WG4183> polyn much ὅτι <WG3754> hoti For χωρὶς <WG5565> chōris apart from ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou Me οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe you can ποιεῖν <WG4160> poiein do οὐδέν <WG3762> ouden nothing .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean If μή <WG3361> mē does not τις <WG5100> tis anyone μένῃ <WG3306> menē remain ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοί <WG1473> emoi Me , ἐβλήθη <WG906> eblēthē that is thrown ἔξω <WG1854> exō away ὡς <WG5613> hōs he is like τὸ <WG3588> to a κλῆμα <WG2814> klēma branch καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐξηράνθη <WG3583> exēranthē withers . καὶ <WG2532> kai - συνάγουσιν <WG4863> synagousin are gathered up , αὐτὰ <WG846> auta [Such branches] καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the πῦρ <WG4442> pyr fire , βάλλουσιν <WG906> ballousin thrown καὶ <WG2532> kai and καίεται <WG2545> kaietai burned .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean If μείνητε <WG3306> meinēte you remain ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta - ῥήματά <WG4487> rhēmata words μου <WG1473> mou My ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , μείνῃ <WG3306> meinē remain ὃ <WG3739> ho whatever ἐὰν <WG1437> ean vvv θέλητε <WG2309> thelēte you wish , αἰτήσασθε <WG154> aitēsasthe ask καὶ <WG2532> kai and γενήσεται <WG1096> genēsetai it will be done ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin for you .

ἐν <WG1722> en - τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō This [is to] ἐδοξάσθη <WG1392> edoxasthē glory , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father’s μου <WG1473> mou My ἵνα <WG2443> hina that καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit , πολὺν <WG4183> polyn much φέρητε <WG5342> pherēte you bear καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv γένησθε* <WG1096> genēsthe [proving] yourselves to be ἐμοὶ <WG1699> emoi My μαθηταί <WG3101> mathētai disciples .

( No Greater Love) Καθὼς <WG2531> Kathōs As ἠγάπησέν <WG25> ēgapēsen has loved με <WG1473> me Me , ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō so ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you . ἠγάπησα <WG25> ēgapēsa have I loved μείνατε <WG3306> meinate Remain ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἀγάπῃ <WG26> agapē love . τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἐμῇ <WG1699> emē My

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean If τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἐντολάς <WG1785> entolas commandments , μου <WG1473> mou My τηρήσητε <WG5083> tērēsēte you keep μενεῖτε <WG3306> meneite you will remain ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἀγάπῃ <WG26> agapē love , μου <WG1473> mou My καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs just as ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I «τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father’s μου» <WG1473> mou My «τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἐντολὰς» <WG1785> entolas commandments τετήρηκα <WG5083> tetērēka have kept καὶ <WG2532> kai and μένω <WG3306> menō remain αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἀγάπῃ <WG26> agapē love .

Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta these things λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ἡ <WG3588> hē - χαρὰ <WG5479> chara joy ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἐμὴ <WG1699> emē My ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ᾖ <WG1510> ē may be καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē - χαρὰ <WG5479> chara joy ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your πληρωθῇ <WG4137> plērōthē may be complete .

Αὕτη <WG3778> Hautē This ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin is ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἐντολὴ <WG1785> entolē commandment , ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἐμὴ <WG1699> emē My ἵνα <WG2443> hina that ἀγαπᾶτε <WG25> agapate you love ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as ἠγάπησα <WG25> ēgapēsa I have loved ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you .

μείζονα <WG3173> meizona Greater ταύτης <WG3778> tautēs than this , ἀγάπην <WG26> agapēn love οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἔχει <WG2192> echei has ἵνα <WG2443> hina that τις <WG5100> tis [he] τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ψυχὴν <WG5590> psychēn life αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his θῇ <WG5087> thē lay down ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for τῶν <WG3588> tōn - φίλων <WG5384> philōn friends . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his

Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis You φίλοι <WG5384> philoi friends μού <WG1473> mou My ἐστε <WG1510> este are ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if ποιῆτε <WG4160> poiēte you do ἃ* <WG3739> ha what ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἐντέλλομαι <WG1781> entellomai command ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you .

οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi No longer λέγω <WG3004> legō do I call ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you δούλους <WG1401> doulous servants , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti for ὁ <WG3588> ho - δοῦλος <WG1401> doulos a servant οὐκ <WG3756> ouk does not οἶδεν <WG1492> oiden understand τί <WG5101> ti what ποιεῖ <WG4160> poiei is doing . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his ὁ <WG3588> ho - κύριος <WG2962> kyrios master ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you δὲ <WG1161> de But εἴρηκα <WG2046> eirēka I have called φίλους <WG5384> philous friends , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because πάντα <WG3956> panta everything ἃ <WG3739> ha - ἤκουσα <WG191> ēkousa I have learned παρὰ <WG3844> para from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father μου <WG1473> mou My ἐγνώρισα <WG1107> egnōrisa I have made known ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you .

οὐχ <WG3756> ouch did not ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis You με <WG1473> me Me , ἐξελέξασθε <WG1586> exelexasthe choose ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἐξελεξάμην <WG1586> exelexamēn chose ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you . καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἔθηκα <WG5087> ethēka I appointed ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἵνα <WG2443> hina to ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis - ὑπάγητε <WG5217> hypagēte go καὶ <WG2532> kai and καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit — φέρητε <WG5342> pherēte bear καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho - καρπὸς <WG2590> karpos fruit ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn - μένῃ <WG3306> menē that will remain — ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ὅ¦τι <WG3754> ho¦ti whatever ἂν <WG302> an - αἰτήσητε <WG154> aitēsēte you ask τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name , μου <WG1473> mou My δῷ <WG1325> dō He will give ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you .
ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta This ἐντέλλομαι <WG1781> entellomai is My command ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you : ἵνα <WG2443> hina - ἀγαπᾶτε <WG25> agapate Love ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another .

( The Hatred of the World) Εἰ <WG1487> Ei If ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , μισεῖ <WG3404> misei hates γινώσκετε <WG1097> ginōskete understand ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me πρῶτον <WG4412> prōton [first] ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn . . . . μεμίσηκεν <WG3404> memisēken it hated

εἰ <WG1487> ei If ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world , ἦτε <WG1510> ēte you were ὁ <WG3588> ho - κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos [it] ἂν <WG302> an vvv τὸ <WG3588> to [as] its ἴδιον <WG2398> idion own . ἐφίλει <WG5368> ephilei would love [you] ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because δὲ <WG1161> de Instead ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἐστέ <WG1510> este you are ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἐξελεξάμην <WG1586> exelexamēn have chosen ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἐκ <WG1537> ek out of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world . διὰ <WG1223> dia . . . τοῦτο <WG3778> touto - , μισεῖ <WG3404> misei hates ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world

Μνημονεύετε <WG3421> Mnēmoneuete Remember τοῦ <WG3588> tou the λόγου <WG3056> logou word οὗ <WG3739> hou that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I εἶπον <WG2036> eipon spoke ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you : Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk ‘ No ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is δοῦλος <WG1401> doulos servant μείζων <WG3173> meizōn greater than τοῦ <WG3588> tou - κυρίου <WG2962> kyriou master .’ ( ) αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his εἰ <WG1487> ei If ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me , ἐδίωξαν <WG1377> ediōxan they persecuted καὶ <WG2532> kai as well ; ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you διώξουσιν <WG1377> diōxousin they will persecute εἰ <WG1487> ei if τὸν <WG3588> ton - λόγον <WG3056> logon word , μου <WG1473> mou My ἐτήρησαν <WG5083> etērēsan they kept καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . τὸν <WG3588> ton - ὑμέτερον <WG5212> hymeteron yours τηρήσουσιν <WG5083> tērēsousin they will keep

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta like this πάντα <WG3956> panta . . . ποιήσουσιν <WG4160> poiēsousin they will treat εἰς <WG1519> eis - ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you διὰ <WG1223> dia because of τὸ <WG3588> to - ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name , μου <WG1473> mou My ὅτι <WG3754> hoti since οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἴδασιν <WG1492> oidasin they do not know τὸν <WG3588> ton the [One who] πέμψαντά <WG3992> pempsanta sent με <WG1473> me Me .

εἰ <WG1487> ei If μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon I had not come καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐλάλησα <WG2980> elalēsa spoken αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian . . . . οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἴχοσαν <WG2192> eichosan they would not be guilty of sin νῦν <WG3568> nyn Now , δὲ <WG1161> de however , πρόφασιν <WG4392> prophasin excuse οὐκ <WG3756> ouk no ἔχουσιν <WG2192> echousin they have περὶ <WG4012> peri for τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin . αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their
Ὁ <WG3588> Ho Whoever ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me μισῶν <WG3404> misōn hates καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . τὸν <WG3588> ton - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father μου <WG1473> mou My μισεῖ <WG3404> misei hates

εἰ <WG1487> ei If τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἔργα <WG2041> erga works μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἐποίησα <WG4160> epoiēsa I had not done ἐν <WG1722> en among αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them ἃ <WG3739> ha that οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἄλλος <WG243> allos else ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen did , ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian . . . ; οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἴχοσαν <WG2192> eichosan they would not be guilty of sin νῦν <WG3568> nyn now δὲ <WG1161> de but καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἑωράκασιν <WG3708> heōrakasin they have seen καὶ <WG2532> kai and μεμισήκασιν <WG3404> memisēkasin hated καὶ <WG2532> kai both ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸν <WG3588> ton - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father . μου <WG1473> mou My

ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ But [this is] ἵνα <WG2443> hina to πληρωθῇ <WG4137> plērōthē fulfill ὁ <WG3588> ho - λόγος <WG3056> logos [what] ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - νόμῳ <WG3551> nomō Law αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their γεγραμμένος <WG1125> gegrammenos is written ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - : Ἐμίσησάν <WG3404> Emisēsan ‘ They hated με <WG1473> me Me δωρεάν <WG1432> dōrean without reason .’ ( See , , and .)

Ὅταν <WG3752> Hotan When ἔλθῃ <WG2064> elthē comes , ὁ <WG3588> ho the Παράκλητος <WG3875> Paraklētos Advocate ( Or Comforter or Helper or Counselor; Greek Paraclete) ὃν <WG3739> hon whom ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I πέμψω <WG3992> pempsō will send ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you παρὰ <WG3844> para from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father — τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias of truth ὃ <WG3739> ho who παρὰ <WG3844> para from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father — ἐκπορεύεται <WG1607> ekporeuetai proceeds ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos He μαρτυρήσει <WG3140> martyrēsei will testify περὶ <WG4012> peri about ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou Me .

καὶ <WG2532> kai also ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you δὲ <WG1161> de And μαρτυρεῖτε <WG3140> martyreite must testify , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from ἀρχῆς <WG746> archēs [the] beginning . [’’] μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou Me ἐστε <WG1510> este you have been
